client.title: Check Out the New, Free Justia Legal Dictionary
description: Encountered a new area of the law in your legal research? Want to quickly check the definition of a legal term? We recently launched our new Justia Legal Dictionary, so you can easily look up legal terms on any device - no research log-ins or physical dictionaries required!
